oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Photographs; Soldiers; Military life; Boys; Men
United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of an unidentified group of men standing in front of a sewing machine store. Some men wear Confederate uniforms. The tintype is set in a decorative gold frame.
